name: Meeting Again
description:
Linear Visual Novel created for the Tyranobuilder Gamejam 2015.

This is my first game and the first jam which I did join - Please Note: despite several proof readings, there might be a few mistakes.

I plan to later make a new updated version, but times might take some time.

This is the story of two friends which meet in a field bathed by the sunset trying to figure the events that lead them there.
